snippet: Apple, which has stumbled in its efforts to get into social media, has talked with Twitter in recent months about making a strategic investment in it, Evelyn M. Rusli and Nick Bilton report in The New York Times.

snippet: When Research In Motion introduces its BlackBerry 10 line of smartphones next year, it probably will not have the marketing budget that Apple devotes to the iPhone. But Frank Boulben, who recently joined RIM as its chief marketing officer, said he...
abstract: When Research In Motion introduces its BlackBerry 10 line of smartphones next year, it probably will not have the marketing budget that Apple devotes to the iPhone. But Frank Boulben, who recently joined RIM as its chief marketing officer, said he hoped that the 78 million people now using BlackBerrys will be his secret weapon.

headline.main: RIM Marketing Head's Secret Weapon: Current BlackBerry Fans
